radiographic_examinations.findings: Diverticulosis of the proximal sigmoid colon in the left lower quadrant with significant surrounding fat stranding, moderate surrounding mesenteric haziness, peritoneal thickening, and mild scattered pneumoperitoneum. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. Normal findings for the liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenals, kidneys, stomach, urinary bladder, uterus, and soft tissues with an umbilical hernia containing fat. No evidence of focal lesions, hydronephrosis, nephrolithiasis, or significant lymphadenopathy.
